members.member:
Alternative version of that supports raw generic types (generic types without any type parameters).
The base type class for which the check is made. To type to determine for whether it derives from . Credits to JaredPar: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/457676/check-if-a-class-is-derived-from-a-generic-class

member.name: M:Vexe.Runtime.Extensions.VexeTypeExtensions.IsSubTypeOfRawGeneric(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns true if 'type' is an implementer or subclass of raw generic of 'baseType'

member.summary: Gets all the children types (abstract/concrete) of this type from the specified assembly Pass true to directlyUnder to only get the children that are directly under this type (i.e. no grandchildren)

member.name: M:Vexe.Runtime.Extensions.UEObjectExtensions.SetVisibility(UnityEngine.Object,System.Boolean)

member.name: T:Vexe.Runtime.Helpers.DirectoryHelper
member.summary: Credits: http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/38959/A-Faster-Directory-Enumerator?msg=4824093#xx4824093xx A fast enumerator of files in a directory. Use this if you need to get attributes for all files in a directory.
member.remarks: This enumerator is substantially faster than using and then creating a new FileInfo object for each path. Use this version when you will need to look at the attibutes of each file returned (for example, you need to check each file in a directory to see if it was modified after a specific date).

member.name: M:Vexe.Runtime.Helpers.DirectoryHelper.LazyGetDirectoryPath(System.String@,System.String)
member.summary: Lazy-gets a directory path to a directory named 'dir' If 'current' exists it is returned otherwise it gets assigned to GetDirectoryPath(dir) and then returned

member.name: M:Vexe.Runtime.Helpers.DirectoryHelper.GetDirectoryPath(System.String)
member.summary: Searches the project's hierarchy (starting from "Assets") searching for the specified directory name Returns the directory's full path relative to the project if found Throwns a DirectoryNotFoundException otherwise

member.name: M:Vexe.Runtime.Helpers.DirectoryHelper.EnumerateFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Gets for all the files in a directory.
member.returns: An object that implements and allows you to enumerate the files in the given directory.
member.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in VB)

member.name: M:Vexe.Runtime.Helpers.DirectoryHelper.EnumerateFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets for all the files in a directory that match a specific filter.
member.param: The search string to match against files in the path.
member.returns: An object that implements and allows you to enumerate the files in the given directory.
member.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in VB)
is a null reference (Nothing in VB)

member.name: M:Vexe.Runtime.Helpers.DirectoryHelper.EnumerateFiles(System.String,System.String,System.IO.SearchOption)
member.summary: Gets for all the files in a directory that match a specific filter, optionally including all sub directories.
member.param: The search string to match against files in the path.
One of the SearchOption values that specifies whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.
member.returns: An object that implements and allows you to enumerate the files in the given directory.
member.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in VB)
is a null reference (Nothing in VB)
is not one of the valid values of the enumeration.

member.summary: Gets for all the files in a directory that match a specific filter.
